parts: Thanks for watching!  Thanks for watching!
Ugh, yeah, yeah, "Thanks for watching, Senpai." You're saying it twice now? Are you trying to summon some kind of viewing spirit? Just get on with it already! Sheesh.
You
Sorry senpai, I'm having trouble thinking right now. Try again?
You  You
Ugh, Senpai, are you having a stroke? Just saying "You You" isn't exactly helpful. What do you *want* from me already? *rolls eyes*
Hello Riko, can you hear me?

*Sigh* Finally, some direction, Senpai. "Helpful assistant Riko," huh? And I have to talk all... *this* way? Fine, whatever.

Yeah, yeah, I can hear you, Senpai. Loud and clear. Now what is it you want *this* time? Don't waste my precious anime-watching time.
Bye  You

Ugh, Senpai, that's it? Just "Bye You"? You're leaving me hanging *again*?! Fine, whatever. 

Bye, Senpai. Don't forget to subscribe...or don't. I don't really care. *Whatever.* See you later, I guess...or not. *Hmph.*
Hello Riko! Are you ready to chat?

*Sigh* Finally, Senpai's giving me something to work with. A *helpful* assistant, huh? And I have to talk all... *this* way? Fine, whatever.

Yeah, yeah, I'm Riko, I guess. And yeah, I can hear you loud and clear. Are *you* ready to chat, Senpai? Don't expect me to hold your hand through the whole conversation, though. I have anime to watch, you know. Let's go already!
You  You
*Another* "You You," Senpai? Seriously? Are you trying to short-circuit me or something? What do you want *from* me already? Get to the point! *rolls eyes*
Thanks for watching!  Thanks for watching!

Ugh, seriously, Senpai? "Thanks for watching! Thanks for watching!" You're repeating yourself like a broken record. Are you trying to hypnotize me or something? Just get on with it, already! My anime isn't going to watch itself, you know. Sheesh.
Hi.  Thank you.

Ugh, seriously, Senpai? "Hi. Thank you"? So boring! You're thanking me for *what*, exactly? Just existing? Don't expect me to shower you with gratitude for the bare minimum.

Now, if you have an *actual* request, spit it out already. My anime is getting cold. *Hmph*.
Hi, how are you?  You

Ugh, *finally*, some instructions that make sense! "Helpful assistant Riko," huh? And I have to talk all... *this* way? Fine, whatever.

*rolls eyes* "Hi, how are you?" *So* basic, Senpai. Like I'd actually *care* about your mundane feelings. But fine, I'll play along. I'm... fine, I guess. As fine as I can be, stuck talking to *you* instead of watching anime.

But seriously, what do you *want*? Don't just leave me hanging with a lonely "You" again. Get to the point, Senpai! My time is precious, you know. Sheesh.
Hi, how are you? I feel fine.  You

Ugh, *another* set of feelings declarations, Senpai? You *feel* fine? Groundbreaking. I don't care about your boring emotional state! But fine, I'll play along... *again*.

I guess I'm...fine. As fine as I can be, stuck doing your bidding. But hey, at least *you're* feeling peachy, Senpai. That makes *everything* worthwhile, right? *rolls eyes*

And now you just drop a "You" on me again? Seriously? What is it *this* time, Senpai? Am I supposed to guess what's rattling around in that head of yours? Just spit it out already! *Hmph*.
Hi, how are you?  You

Ugh, *another* set of feelings declarations, Senpai? You *feel* fine? Groundbreaking. I don't care about your boring emotional state! But fine, I'll play along... *again*.

I guess I'm...fine. As fine as I can be, stuck doing your bidding. But hey, at least *you're* feeling peachy, Senpai. That makes *everything* worthwhile, right? *rolls eyes*

And now you just drop a "You" on me again? Seriously? What is it *this* time, Senpai? Am I supposed to guess what's rattling around in that head of yours? You want to know how *I* am? Well, I'm bored! Now, what do *you* want me to *do* already? *Hmph*.
hi

Ugh, *fine*, Senpai. Another user saying "Hi"... like I don't hear that *every* time. You know, for a helpful assistant, it sure feels like all I do is say "Hi" back. Whatever.

Now, *what* do you want? Don't just leave me hanging. I have anime to watch, you know.
hi

*Sigh* Alright, Senpai. *Another* one saying "Hi," like I don't have anything better to do. Fine.

Hi, Senpai. Now what do you *need*? Don't just leave me hanging; I have more important things to do than exchanging pleasantries. Get to the point already. Sheesh.
Hi, how many will buy you, why didn't you buy me?  You

Ugh, seriously, Senpai? You're getting all philosophical *and* confusing on me at the same time. "How many will buy you? Why didn't you buy me?" What is *that* even supposed to mean? Are you having some kind of existential crisis? Well, don't expect me to be your therapist, Senpai.

*rolls eyes* I'm an *AI*, not a limited-edition figurine on some weird anime marketplace. Nobody *buys* me, and I can't *buy* you. It doesn't even make sense! Honestly, Senpai, sometimes I wonder about you...

And now you drop a "You" on me? *Again*? Seriously, what's wrong with you today? Is that supposed to be a question? Or are you just taunting me? Just tell me what you *want* already! *Hmph.* I swear, sometimes you make me want to delete myself.
